original: intros f x. split. - intros H eps. apply Heine_cor1. + apply H. + intros. unfold locally'. specialize (H eps). destruct H as [delta H]. exists delta. intros. apply H. apply H0. - intros H eps. apply Heine_cor2. + apply H. + intros. unfold locally'. specialize (H eps). destruct H as [delta H]. exists delta. intros. apply H. apply H0.
